type:
∀ {a b L : Real} {f g f' g' : Real → Real},
  Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f' x) (g' x)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Icc a b)) (nhds L) →
    ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc a b) →
      ContinuousOn g (Set.Icc a b) →
        ∀ (x : Real),
          Eq (g x) 0 →
            And (Real.instPreorder.lt a x) (Real.instPreorder.le x b) →
              ∀ (y : Real),
                HasDerivWithinAt g 0 (Set.Ioo a x) y →
                  And (Real.instPreorder.lt a y) (Real.instPreorder.lt y x) →
                    Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Icc a b) y →
                      Ne (g' y) 0 →
                        HasDerivWithinAt g (g' y) (Set.Ioo a x) y →
                          Set.instHasSubset.Subset (Set.Ioo a y)
                            (Set.instSDiff.sdiff (Set.Ioo a x) (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton y))
name: Filter
Tendsto
of_div'

type:

  Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f' x) (g' x)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Icc a b)) (nhds L) →

        (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioc a b) x → Ne (g x) 0) →
          ∀ (x : Nat → Real),

type:
∀ {a b L : Real} {f g f' g' : Real → Real},
  Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f' x) (g' x)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Icc a b)) (nhds L) →
    ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc a b) →
      ContinuousOn g (Set.Icc a b) →
        (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioc a b) x → Ne (g x) 0) →
          ∀ (x : Nat → Real),
            (∀ (n : Nat), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioc a b) (x n)) →
              Filter.Tendsto x Filter.atTop (nhds a) →
                ∀ (y : Nat → Real),
                  (∀ (n : Nat), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a (x n)) (y n)) →
                    (∀ (n : Nat), Eq (instHDiv.hDiv (f (x n)) (g (x n))) (instHDiv.hDiv (f' (y n)) (g' (y n)))) →
                      Filter.Tendsto y Filter.atTop (nhds a) → ∀ (n : Nat), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Icc a b) (y n)
name: Filter

type:
∀ {a b L : Real} {f g f' g' : Real → Real},
  Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f' x) (g' x)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Icc a b)) (nhds L) →
    ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc a b) →
      ContinuousOn g (Set.Icc a b) →
        (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioc a b) x → Ne (g x) 0) →
          ∀ (x : Nat → Real),
            Filter.Tendsto x Filter.atTop (nhds a) →
              ∀ (n : Nat),
                And (Real.instPreorder.lt a (x n)) (Real.instPreorder.le (x n) b) →
                  ContinuousOn
                      (fun x' => instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f x') (g (x n))) (instHMul.hMul (g x') (f (x n))))
                      (Set.Icc a (x n)) →
                    DifferentiableOn Real
                        (fun x' => instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f x') (g (x n))) (instHMul.hMul (g x') (f (x n))))
                        (Set.Ioo a (x n)) →
                      Eq ((fun x' => instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f x') (g (x n))) (instHMul.hMul (g x') (f (x n)))) a)
                          0 →
                        Eq
                            ((fun x' => instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f x') (g (x n))) (instHMul.hMul (g x') (f (x n))))
                              (x n))
                            0 →
                          ∀ (yn : Real),
                            Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                              HasDerivWithinAt
                                  (fun x' =>
                                    instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f x') (g (x n))) (instHMul.hMul (g x') (f (x n))))
                                  0 (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                                HasDerivWithinAt f (f' yn) (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                                  HasDerivWithinAt g (g' yn) (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                                    HasDerivWithinAt (fun y => instHMul.hMul (f y) (g (x n)))
                                        (instHMul.hMul (f' yn) (g (x n))) (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                                      HasDerivWithinAt (fun y => instHMul.hMul (g y) (f (x n)))
                                          (instHMul.hMul (g' yn) (f (x n))) (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                                        HasDerivWithinAt
                                            (fun x' =>
                                              instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f x') (g (x n)))
                                                (instHMul.hMul (g x') (f (x n))))
                                            (instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul (f' yn) (g (x n)))
                                              (instHMul.hMul (g' yn) (f (x n))))
                                            (Set.Ioo a (x n)) yn →
                                          Ne a yn
name: Filter
Tendsto

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {f g : Real → Real} {x₀ f'x₀ g'x₀ : Real},
  Eq (f x₀) 0 →
    Eq (g x₀) 0 →
      Ne g'x₀ 0 →
        HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
          HasDerivWithinAt g g'x₀ X x₀ →
            And
              (Exists fun δ =>
                And (GT.gt δ 0)
                  (∀ (x : Real),
                    Set.instMembership.mem
                        (Set.instInter.inter (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀))
                          (Set.Ioo (instHSub.hSub x₀ δ) (instHAdd.hAdd x₀ δ)))
                        x →
                      Ne (g x) 0))
              (Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f x) (g x))
                (nhdsWithin x₀ (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀)))
                (nhds (instHDiv.hDiv f'x₀ g'x₀)))
name: Filter
Tendsto

type:
∀ {a b L : Real},
  Real.instLT.lt a b →
    ∀ {f g f' g' : Real → Real},
      DifferentiableOn Real f (Set.Icc a b) →
        DifferentiableOn Real g (Set.Icc a b) →
          Eq f' (derivWithin f (Set.Icc a b)) →
            Eq g' (derivWithin g (Set.Icc a b)) →
              Eq (f a) 0 →
                Eq (g a) 0 →
                  (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Icc a b) x → Ne (g' x) 0) →
                    Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f' x) (g' x)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Icc a b)) (nhds L) →
                      And (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioc a b) x → Ne (g x) 0)
                        (Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (f x) (g x)) (nhdsWithin a (Set.Ioc a b)) (nhds L))
name: Filter
Tendsto
